title: Did riot rip me off? I'm so confused
body:
Here's the conversation I had with the support person.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/22723283?flash_digest=d1a5cd8a77bb5c7adca170ebfea033400513ec4d
So I bought those... But the support person says it can only be purchased with rp and not ip. But if I look and click on the purchased box I can CLEARLY see you can also buy it for 750 ip??? Seriously if I could buy with ip then I could still afford one augment bundle???

replies.body:
Since you have a ticket open with support, I strongly recommend continuing to work with your specialist on this. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
